title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.3 - Sightseeing permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.3 - Sightseeing permit

State Regulations

No person shall conduct sightseeing flights or tours at any
terminal except under permit from the authority. By sightseeing flights or
tours is meant flights or tours on which passengers are carried for hire and
which originate and terminate at the same terminal with no intermediate stops
other than emergency stops. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1154.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
